version_description: - Minor bug fixes.
- Fixed a crash when pressing on shuffle button.

- Sorting has been added in all tabs.
- Fixed Critical Bugs.
- Improvement speed loading any songs.
- Update the splash screen professionally.

- Add Hamado Music channel search.
- Minor bug fixes and small improvements for the app.

Thank you for using!
- Bug fixes and improvements.

- Update NTC and Zing MP3 searching
- Minor improvements and bug fixes
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Thank you so much for your using. This version we are glad to let you know we did:
- Fixed some critical crash while using.
- Updated a few minor bugs.

Thank You!

- General bug fixes and improve stability.
- Fixed sometimes the selected song does not play.
- Improved the player controls.
- Fixed a crash while loading ad.

- Fixed the player sometimes does not play.
- Now playing info does not update in the remote control player.
- Minor bug fixes and improve app's stability.

Thank you for using the app.

- Fixed a crash of MZ3.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Upgraded to Swift 4.2, fully support iPhone XS Max, XR, XS.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
- Fixed a crash when pressing on shuffle button.

Hot fixed:
- Fixed logic repeat button in the music player screen.
- Re-updated the splash screen.
- Re-updated shuffle, repeat background image.

- Fixed correctly: Something ends you up in a state of limbo of infinite skipping
- General bug fixes and improvements.
- Minor bug fixes.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
Specially we've added the SFSpeechRecognizer feature, now you can speak to text any keyword in the Search screen.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. This version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
- Update suggestion keywords.
